message.entry: Calibration data must contain at least 2 camera extrinsics and 2 gripper poses.
cameraExtrinsics and gripperPose must have the same length.
Unable to estimate camera robot transformation. The 3-D orientations of the {0} might be too similar across the calibration data. Remove any similar poses and recalibrate again.
estimateCameraRobotTransform이 최대 반복 횟수만큼 반복했지만 수렴되지 않았습니다. 새 cameraExtrinsics 및 gripperPose 세트로 재보정하십시오.
연속된 2회의 반복이 동일한 결과를 반환한 후 estimateCameraRobotTransform이 정체되었습니다. 새 cameraExtrinsics 및 gripperPose 세트로 재보정하십시오.
Unable to estimate camera robot transformation due to numerical instability or scaling issues during the iterative process. Recalibrate with a new set of cameraExtrinsics and gripperPose.
